newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to Watch.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to Watch.

text.p: * Compaq Computer Corp reported third quarter earnings per share of $1.25, up from $0.89 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $1.07. The stock closed at 75-1/8 on Tuesday.

* Computer Associates International Inc reported second quarter earnings of $0.59 a share, up from $0.45 a year ago, excluding an acquisition charge. The First Call estimate was $0.55. The stock closed at 65-5/8.
* Rubbermaid Inc reported third quarter earnings of $0.31 a share, compared to $0.32 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $0.32. The stock closed at 24-3/8.
* Ford Motor Co reported third quarter earnings of $0.56 a share, including $0.03 in gains. A year ago it earned $0.27. The First Call consensus was $0.52. The stock closed at 32-3/4.
* Bausch & Lomb Inc reported third quarter earnings of $0.54 a share, before a charge, compared to $0.75 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $0.55. The stock closed at 37-1/8.
* Schering-Plough Corp reported third quarter earnings of $0.79 a share, compared to $0.68 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $0.78.
* Merck & Co is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $0.81, compared to $0.70 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 71-5/8.
* BankAmerica Corp is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $1.83, compared to $1.72 last year, according to First Call. The stock closed at 88.
* Fleet Financial Group is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $1.01, compared to $0.96 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 46-1/2.
